wikipedia_page.main: Ian Frederick Filby (born 9 October 1954) is an English retired professional football forward who played professionally in England, South Africa and North America.

response: Bala'c had brief spells with Sacramento Gold and Sporting Lisbon winning the ASL Championship in 1980 under coach Bill Williams with fellow countrymen Ian Filby, Bobby Arber and Gordon Fearnley.
